body_html:
For future readers, in the end I had to use model.cpu() for sharing between threads and in each thread used model.cuda() to do the actual training. I have done that with version 0.4.1 because 0.4.0 has some weird issues on pickles. I hope the sharing problem solves soon so we don;t have to use such hacky and inefficient methods.

edit: I could only make sharing between processes to work but pooling gives me the following error:
AssertionError: daemonic processes are not allowed to have children
